alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 6:04PM EDT until April 27 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 604 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Monticello to 21 miles southeast of St George Island, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Perry, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Alma, Pinland, Cody, Jug Island, Pinetta, Drifton, Scanlon, Lovett, Foley, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Lake Miccosukee, Iddo and Moseley Hall. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
